ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ ASEAN'CULTURE ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
Happy Songkran to all our Thai friends! The most famous Songkran tradition is getting soaked wet and splashed by blessed water, which is seen as a way of paying respect and bringing good fortune. Songkran lasts for 4 days, it starts with cleaning day to remove the dirt from the previous years. The second day is when people prepare food and offerings for monks and temples. On the third day, locals will bathe Buddha statues with jasmine scented water which is believed to bring good luck for the new year. Last day is the day to pay respect to ancestors and elders by sprinkling water onto them.
Source : ASEAN
